Articles.Content: MiM-2 is mine. It already has lava oceans and a titan-esque atmosphere. You can literaly see no surface definition from atmosphere, because of the thick atmosphere. Also, the test moon is now called Arane.
Astro, would you like to do the first 'officially' named moon, or an MTM?

I would really just call the first three moons of Mysterio to be MTMs, and then we will give the other moons of Mysterio proper names, however, It would be nice to do something like this for example (amarius1's MTM-2):

MTM-2 "Arane"

description: [insert hillarious description here]

In other words, We give the first few a designation as well as a nickname, then after we are finished with the moons, no other moons of Mysterio will be considered MTMs and will be given actual names.

I would like to do a moon at some time, however, we only have 3 MTMs, but we may include a fourth one for we four developers of the mod.

Oh, and MrHappyFace, you may do MTM-3 "[insert nickname here]"

We will also change Mysterio's radius to 300km instead of keeping it at 100km - 25km atmospheres don't end well with 100km gaseous planets.

Edited May 31, 2015 by Astrofox

Astro, check Mysterio in the tracking station, if you have the latest download, it's already 300km in radius and the atmosphere had been raised to 75km to accommodate the change in radius.

Also, since we apparently have to "[insert nickname here]"

I have a name proper name for MTM-1, "Haricot," which is French for bean.

Edited May 31, 2015 by Hammersamatom

Ok, I will update (didn't see that link there, well, at least until I re-updated the page).

Edit: for some reason, Mysterio still has it's 100km radius and 25km Atmosphere (I'm fine with no atmosphere height change for the next pre-alpha version).

Do you want me to upload an updated config?

Edited May 31, 2015 by Astrofox
God I can't wait to release some screenies of how my moon looks... It is called Tyrok.
Awesome, I will hopefully upload an updated copy.
Wait, Amarius, so which is which? Is Tyrok one of the MTM's? Is it one of the officially named moons? What about Arane, what is it?

Updated config here!

Anyway, I will start my MTM-4, since I have been bug-fixing and testing (as well as actually flying my spacecraft to) the planets and moons.

They work really well, and I will get started immediately on MTM-4 "(I will come up with name as I go along)"

Wait, Amarius, so which is which? Is Tyrok one of the MTM's? Is it one of the officially named moons? What about Arane, what is it?

Arane is the current test moon and Tyrok is MTM2 with lava ocenas and dense clouds.

- - - Updated - - -

Updated config here!

Anyway, I will start my MTM-4, since I have been bug-fixing and testing (as well as actually flying my spacecraft to) the planets and moons.

They work really well, and I will get started immediately on MTM-4 "(I will come up with name as I go along)"

MTM4 should be called Tihoratus. Please pleople, try to make everyhting as unique as possible but as well as not absurdely unrealistic because I have learned that thiese two things are what people want from planet packs.

We should make an organized list of what planets are being made by who, because frankly, I'm getting a headache reading this thread.

I made a google spreadsheet here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ffskOk2FI8IdTKowNPwLRZ4HhXw2OaTVcMIRTROVIA0/edit#gid=0

PLEASE put all the planets you're making in there.

Sorry, Google drive bugs for me, despite having a gmail account.

I'm [email protected] if you are wondering.

My name is Astro as well, Astro Fox (I had to do exactly that - because reasons).

Edited May 31, 2015 by Astrofox

Happy, I'm Jose16960, I have just requested access.

I also sent a request with my hammersamatom GMail.

Edited May 31, 2015 by Hammersamatom

I put MTM-4-Asterix-Tihoratus where it belongs - the cloud/Dropbox.

It doesn't show up, why? I have no mods other than Hyperedit, and I even checked the config several times, and MTM-4 did not appear.

Here is the Download to the updated pack with the non-functional (as of yet) MTM-4: Astro's Planets

Please show me how to configure the file, since I have looked for Kopernicus planet making tutorials and have not found them, I have found older planet making guides but I'm looking for one that's up to date. Also tell me if MTM-4 didn't come in the download.
You missnamed the parent folder, you named it MTN-4.

Whoops, well, there goes my credibility.

Ah well, I'll probably end up writing on a bunch of sticky notes/pieces of paper so that I remember to check things.

Thanks, I will update the file now.

Edit: Updated files HERE!

Hopefully it works for you guys.

Nope, still doesn't work.

Edited May 31, 2015 by Astrofox

No problem, I have a checklist. Miss-naming things is on the top of the list.

Checking through again.

Edited May 31, 2015 by Hammersamatom

K guys I'm back what did i missed? I just watched Chapie while coding while finishing my math homework while eating whyle listening to music! Crazy night for me now... I'm about to sleep and I'm just taking a look at the new MTM4 texture.

- - - Updated - - -

We should make an organized list of what planets are being made by who, because frankly, I'm getting a headache reading this thread.

I made a google spreadsheet here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ffskOk2FI8IdTKowNPwLRZ4HhXw2OaTVcMIRTROVIA0/edit#gid=0

PLEASE put all the planets you're making in there.

Doesn't work. Guys just request access until he makes it fully public.

Well, nothing much, it is developing rather well, and I think we could release our first version within a month or two.

I have driver's ed tomorrow from 8:00am -2:00pm, and this continues for the entire week (June 1st - 5th), so I may only be able to reply after 2:00, but I will be checking on my phone for updates before 8:00.

Do you think we should put a poll on this page for people to suggest what they would like to see, of course, amarius1 already contacted a youtuber and got a request from him, and this means that we should post a poll, right?

Now, if you want for me to post a poll, what would the choices be?

Poll: Moons for other Planets, Seperate system entirely, Comets, Trojan Moons, etc.

Also, I fixed MTM-4. You need a shorter name, it goes off the screen in the tracking station and map view.

Dropbox

Edited May 31, 2015 by Hammersamatom

Good Poll choices Hammersamatom, but I shortened the name and it still doesn't work, should I just keep it as Tihoratus and then place a description that says that its index name is MTM-4?

I tried: it didn't work.

Edited May 31, 2015 by Astrofox
Whoops, forgot to make it public. You can edit it now.

@Kopernicus:AFTER[Kopernicus]

{

Body

{

name = MTM-4-Asterix-Tihoratus

flightGlobalsIndex = 766

Orbit

{

referenceBody = Mysterio //You can also add moons to the stock planets, for example, Jool.

color = 0.1,0.35,0.5,1

inclination = 5 //Don't be afraid to set high inclinations or eccentricities for asteroids, this makes them more of a challenge to get to!

eccentricity = 0

semiMajorAxis = 10000000 //this is about twice Bop's SMA.

longitudeOfAscendingNode = 55

argumentOfPeriapsis = 0

meanAnomalyAtEpoch = 0

epoch = 0

}

Properties

{

description = It's a really small moon around a mysterious gas giant named Mysterio! Well, Mysterio isn't giant, it's smaller than Kerbin, and that's what startled us.

radius = 10000 //You can have a really tiny asteroid if you want. Kopernicus will still work if this number is as low as 100 meters

geeASL = 0.04 //don't set this too low, or the body will have an SOI that's too small. Gilly = 0.03

tidallyLocked = False

initialRotation = 310

rotationPeriod = 10000

rotates = true

timewarpAltitudeLimits = 0 3000 4000 5000 5000 7000 8000 9000

ScienceValues

{

landedDataValue = 12

inSpaceLowDataValue = 10

inSpaceHighDataValue = 9.5

recoveryValue = 10

spaceAltitudeThreshold = 15000

}

}

ScaledVersion

{

type = Vacuum

fadeStart = 95000

fadeEnd = 97000

Material

{

// Common scaled space settings

texture = Astro'sPlanets/MysterioSystem/Moons/MTM-4/Textures/MTM-4_color

normals = Astro'sPlanets/MysterioSystem/Moons/MTM-4/Textures/MTM-4_normal

shininess = 0

specular = 0,0,0,1

}

}

PQS

{

maxQuadLengthsPerFrame = 0.03

minLevel = 2

maxLevel = 12

minDetailDistance = 8

materialType = AtmosphericOptimized

Material

{

saturation = 1

contrast = 1.8

tintColor = 0.000,0.000,0.000,0.000

powerNear = 0.6

powerFar = 0.5

groundTexStart = 0

groundTexEnd = 1000

steepPower = 1.25

steepTexStart = 0

steepTexEnd = 50000

steepTex = BUILTIN/terrain_rock00

steepBumpMap = BUILTIN/RockyGround2

steepNearTiling = 100

steepTiling = 60

lowTex = BUILTIN/RockyGround

lowBumpMap = BUILTIN/quiet

lowNearTiling = 2000

lowMultiFactor = 100

lowBumpNearTiling = 2000

lowBumpFarTiling = 4000

midTex = BUILTIN/RockyGround

midBumpMap = BUILTIN/SandyGround

midNearTiling = 4000

midMultiFactor = 100

midBumpNearTiling = 4000

midBumpFarTiling = 4000

highTex = BUILTIN/RockyGround

highBumpMap = BUILTIN/quiet

highNearTiling = 4000

highMultiFactor = 100

highBumpNearTiling = 8000

highBumpFarTiling = 4000

lowStart = 0

lowEnd = 0.3

highStart = 0.8

highEnd = 1

globalDensity = 0

fogColorRamp = BUILTIN/desert_atmogradient

}

Mods

{

VertexColorMap

{

map = Astro'sPlanets/MysterioSystem/Moons/MTM-4/Textures/MTM-4_color.png

modEnabled = True

blend = 1.0

order = 9999993

}

VertexHeightMap

{

map = Astro'sPlanets/MysterioSystem/Moons/MTM-4/PluginData/MTM-4_Height.png

offset = 0

deformity = 3500.0

scaleDeformityByRadius = false

order = 20

enabled = true

}

VertexSimplexNoiseColor

{

seed = 777

blend = 1.0

colorStart = 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0

colorEnd = 0.44, 0.37, 0.31, 1.0

octaves = 20.0

persistence = 0.5

frequency = 0.75

enabled = true

order = 100

}

HeightColorMap

{

blend = 0.7

order = 201

enabled = true

LandClasses

{

Class

{

name = AbyPl

altitudeStart = 0.0

altitudeEnd = 0.5

color = 0.0,0.0,0.0,1.0

lerpToNext = true

}

Class

{

name = Beach

altitudeStart = 0.5

altitudeEnd = 0.55

color = 0.164179087,0.164179087,0.164179087,1.0

lerpToNext = true

}

Class

{

name = Beach2

altitudeStart = 0.55

altitudeEnd = 1.0

color = 0.373134315,0.373134315,0.373134315,1.0

lerpToNext = false

}

}

}

}

}

}

}

Replace everything in the MTM-4 config with this, shorten the name, change what you need to.

Replace your MTM-4 folder with this.

MTM-4 Patched
